name: Space Crossing
description: A lonely alien must walk through space in order to reach back home. As he crosses the road, there are several alien ships on the highway that he must avoid. The alien must run fast across the board in order to cross the road and avoid being hit. Every time he crosses the road completely, he gathers himself 100 points and moves onto the next level. On the flip side, every time he gets hit by an alien ship, he has to start over from level 1 with a total of 0 points.
